item.title: Exploring visionOS
item.description: Introduction I find myself fascinated by the idea of creating an app for visionOS where I could possibly display 3D AirPods that I like. Here are a few steps on how you can do the same: First step The first step that you need to do is to create a visionOS project. Second step The next step would be adding a 3D object to Reality Composer Pro and exporting it as a .
